headline.main: U.N. Wants to Know Why Peacekeepers Did Not Stop Violence in South Sudan

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The secretary general, Ban Ki-moon, has ordered an independent inquiry into a spate of violence last month, including the rapes and beatings of foreign aid workers....
lead_paragraph: The secretary general, Ban Ki-moon, has ordered an independent inquiry into a spate of violence last month, including the rapes and beatings of foreign aid workers.
